overview: Jerusalem... City of Peace... A place sacred to three world faiths and engraved forever on the hearts and minds of people. Tracing its history back to the 4th millennium BCE, Jerusalem is one of the oldest cities in the world. People come from around the world to see the sites that you'll see today. Over the years Dr. John Hagee has led many people on tours to the Holy Land. Matt Hagee has joined him on some of these tours as well. Today, we'll see and hear from them, 1st hand, about the significance of these new discoveries and there is so much to see in and around this holy city! We'll join them as they follow in the footsteps of Abraham, David and Bathsheba, Hezekiah, Jesus and the Apostles... and as they experience the wonder of...The City of David.
title: City of David
